ValidationRule.description:
A supplier Account must have the ERP/Tech System field populated in one of the following statuses.
Negotiation Partnership Execution Active & Revenue Generating
https://choco.atlassian.net/browse/OPSSYS-642
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( RecordType.Name ="Supplier", NOT( $Permission.Override_Validation ), OR(TEXT( Account_Status__c) = "Negotiation", TEXT( Account_Status__c) = "Partnership Execution", TEXT( Account_Status__c) = "Active & Revenue Generating" ), ISBLANK( ERP_Tech_System__c )
&& $Profile.Id <> '00e1r0000013R1G' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please complete the ERP/Tech System field!
